                                                                            /*
 * ä¸ºæè¿°å’Œå¤„ç†ä¸ªäººä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œå®šä¹‰ç±» Person
 */
public class Person {
 
 String name;
 private int age;
 
 public Person(){
  
 }
 
 public Person(String name,int age){
  this.name = name;
  this.age = age;
 }
 
 public void eat(){
  System.out.println("åƒé¥­");
  sleep();
 }
 
 private void sleep(){
  System.out.println("ç¡è§‰");
 }

 public int getAge() {
  return age;
 }

 public void setAge(int age) {
  this.age = age;
 }
 
}

  this.name = name;
//  this.age = age;
  setAge(age);
  this.major = major;
 }
 
// public void eat(){

// }
// 
// public void sleep(){
//  System.out.println("ç¡è§‰");
// }

  System.out.println("å­¦ä¹ ");
 }

  System.out.println("name:" + name + ",age = " + getAge());
 }

                                                                            /*
 * é¢å‘å¯¹è±¡çš„ç‰¹å¾äºŒ:ç»§æ‰¿æ€§
 * 
 * ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆè¦æœ‰ç»§æ‰¿ï¼Ÿ
 *   å¤šä¸ªç±»ä¸­å­˜åœ¨ç›¸åŒå±æ€§å’Œè¡Œä¸ºæ—¶ï¼Œå°†è¿™äº›å†…å®¹æŠ½å–åˆ°å•ç‹¬ä¸€ä¸ªç±»ä¸­ï¼Œ
 *   é‚£ä¹ˆå¤šä¸ªç±»æ— éœ€å†å®šä¹‰è¿™äº›å±æ€§å’Œè¡Œä¸ºï¼Œåªè¦ç»§æ‰¿é‚£ä¸ªç±»å³å¯ã€‚
 *  * ä¸€ã€ç»§æ‰¿æ€§çš„å¥½å¤„
 * â‘  å‡å°‘äº†ä»£ç çš„å†—ä½™ï¼Œæé«˜äº†ä»£ç çš„å¤ç”¨æ€§ï¼›
 * â‘¡ ä¾¿äºåŠŸèƒ½çš„æ‰©å±•ï¼›
 * â‘¢ ä¸ºä¹‹åå¤šæ€æ€§çš„ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œæä¾›äº†å‰æã€‚
 * 
 * äºŒã€ç»§æ‰¿æ€§çš„æ ¼å¼
 *  class A extends B{}
 *  A:å­ç±»ã€æ´¾ç”Ÿç±»ã€subclass
 *  B:çˆ¶ç±»ã€è¶…ç±»ã€åŸºç±»ã€superclass
 *  
 *  2.1 ä½“ç°ï¼šä¸€æ—¦å­ç±» A ç»§æ‰¿çˆ¶ç±»ä»¥åï¼Œå­ç±» A ä¸­å°±è·å–äº†çˆ¶ç±» B ä¸­å£°æ˜çš„ç»“æ„ï¼šå±æ€§ã€æ–¹æ³•
 *   ç‰¹åˆ«çš„ï¼Œçˆ¶ç±»ä¸­å£°æ˜ä¸º private çš„å±æ€§æˆ–æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå­ç±»ç»§æ‰¿çˆ¶ç±»ä»¥åï¼Œä»ç„¶è®¤ä¸ºè·å–äº†çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­ç§æœ‰çš„ç»“æ„ã€‚
 *   åªæœ‰å› ä¸ºå°è£…æ€§çš„å½±å“ï¼Œä½¿å¾—å­ç±»ä¸èƒ½ç›´æ¥è°ƒç”¨çˆ¶ç±»çš„ç»“æ„è€Œå·²ã€‚
 *  2.2 å­ç±»ç»§æ‰¿çˆ¶ç±»ä»¥åï¼Œè¿˜å¯ä»¥å£°æ˜è‡ªå·±ç‰¹æœ‰çš„å±æ€§æˆ–æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå®ç°åŠŸèƒ½çš„æ‹“å±•ã€‚
 *   å­ç±»å’Œçˆ¶ç±»çš„å…³ç³»ï¼šä¸åŒäºå­é›†ä¸é›†åˆçš„å…³ç³»ã€‚
 *   extends:å»¶å±•ã€æ‰©å±•
 * 
 */
public class ExtendsTest {

 public static void main(String[] args) {
  Person p1 = new Person();
//  p1.age = 1;
  p1.eat();
  System.out.println("********************");
  
  Student s1 = new Student();
  s1.eat();
//  s1.sleep();
  s1.name = "Tom";
  
  s1.setAge(10);
  System.out.println(s1.getAge());
  
 }
}

                                                                            /*
 * å®šä¹‰ç±»Kidsç»§æ‰¿ManKindï¼Œå¹¶åŒ…æ‹¬ïƒ˜
 * æˆå‘˜å˜é‡int yearsOldï¼›ïƒ˜
 * æ–¹æ³•printAge()æ‰“å°yearsOldçš„å€¼
 * 
 */
public class Kids extends ManKind{

 private int yearsOld; //å¹´é™
 
 public Kids() {


 }

 public Kids(int yearsOld) {
  this.yearsOld = yearsOld;
 }

 public int getYearsOld() {
  return yearsOld;
 }

 public void setYearsOld(int yearsOld) {
  this.yearsOld = yearsOld;
 }

 public void printAge(){
  System.out.println("I am " + yearsOld);
 }
}

                                                                            ManKindç±»

                                                                            /*
 * å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªManKindç±»ï¼ŒåŒ…æ‹¬ïƒ˜
 * æˆå‘˜å˜é‡int sexå’Œint salaryï¼›ïƒ˜
 * æ–¹æ³•void manOrWoman()ï¼šæ ¹æ®sexçš„å€¼æ˜¾ç¤ºâ€œmanâ€(sex==1)æˆ–è€…â€œwomanâ€(sex==0)ï¼›
 * æ–¹æ³•void employeed()ï¼šæ ¹æ®salaryçš„å€¼æ˜¾ç¤ºâ€œno jobâ€(salary==0)æˆ–è€…â€œjobâ€(salary!=0)ã€‚
 * 
 */
public class ManKind {

 private int sex; //æ€§åˆ«
 private int salary; //è–ªèµ„
 
 public ManKind() {
  
 }

 public ManKind(int sex, int salary) {
  this.sex = sex;
  this.salary = salary;
 }

 public void manOrWoman(){
  if(sex==1){
   System.out.println("man");
  }else if(sex==0){
   System.out.println("woman");
  }
 }
 
 public void employeed(){
  if(salary==0){
   System.out.println("no job");
  }else if(salary!=0){
   System.out.println("job");
  }
 }

 public int getSex() {
  return sex;
 }

 public void setSex(int sex) {
  this.sex = sex;
 }

 public int getSalary() {
  return salary;
 }

 public void setSalary(int salary) {
  this.salary = salary;
 }
 
}

                                                                            KidsTest

                                                                            /*
 * å®šä¹‰ç±»KidsTestï¼Œåœ¨ç±»çš„mainæ–¹æ³•ä¸­å®ä¾‹åŒ–Kidsçš„å¯¹è±¡someKidï¼Œ
 * ç”¨è¯¥å¯¹è±¡è®¿é—®å…¶çˆ¶ç±»çš„æˆå‘˜å˜é‡åŠæ–¹æ³•ã€‚
 * 
 */
public class KidsTest {
 public static void main(String[] args) {
  
  Kids someKid = new Kids(12);
  
  someKid.printAge();
  
  someKid.setYearsOld(15);
  someKid.setSalary(0);
  someKid.setSex(1);
  
  someKid.employeed();
  someKid.manOrWoman();
 }
}

                                                                            2ã€ç»ƒä¹ 2

                                                                            public class Circle {

 public double radius; //åŠå¾„
 
 public Circle(){
  radius = 1.0;
 }

 public double getRadius() {
  return radius;
 }

 public void setRadius(double radius) {
  this.radius = radius;
 }
 
 public double findArea(){ //è®¡ç®—åœ†çš„é¢ç§¯
  return Math.PI * radius * radius;
 }
}

                                                                            Cylinderç±»

                                                                            public class Cylinder extends Circle{

 private double length;
 
 public Cylinder(){
  length = 1.0;
 }

 public double getLength() {
  return length;
 }

 public void setLength(double length) {
  this.length = length;
 }
 
 public double findVolume(){ //è®¡ç®—åœ†æŸ±ä½“ç§¯
  return findArea() * length;
 }
}

                                                                            æµ‹è¯•ç±»

                                                                            public class CylinderTest {
 public static void main(String[] args) {
  
  Cylinder cy = new Cylinder();
  
  cy.setRadius(2.1);
  cy.setLength(3.4);
  double volues = cy.findVolume();
  System.out.println("åœ†æŸ±çš„ä½“ç§¯:" + volues);
  
  double area = cy.findArea();
  System.out.println("åœ†çš„é¢ç§¯: " + area);
 }
}

                                                                            3ã€æµ‹è¯•ç±»

                                                                            /*
 * æ–¹æ³•çš„é‡å†™(override/overwrite)
 * 
 * 1.é‡å†™ï¼šå­ç±»ç»§æ‰¿çˆ¶ç±»ä»¥åï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¯¹çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­çš„æ–¹æ³•è¿›è¡Œè¦†ç›–æ“ä½œã€‚
 * 2.åº”ç”¨ï¼šé‡å†™ä»¥åï¼Œå½“åˆ›å»ºå­ç±»å¯¹è±¡ä»¥åï¼Œé€šè¿‡å­ç±»å¯¹è±¡å»è°ƒç”¨å­çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­åŒååŒå‚æ•°æ–¹æ³•æ—¶ï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œçš„æ˜¯å­ç±»é‡å†™çˆ¶ç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚
 *   å³åœ¨ç¨‹åºæ‰§è¡Œæ—¶ï¼Œå­ç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•å°†è¦†ç›–çˆ¶ç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚
 * 
 * é¢è¯•é¢˜ï¼šåŒºåˆ†æ–¹æ³•çš„é‡è½½ä¸é‡å†™(æœ‰çš„ä¹¦ä¹Ÿå«åšâ€œè¦†ç›–â€)
 *   ç­”ï¼šæ–¹æ³•çš„é‡å†™Overridingå’Œé‡è½½Overloadingæ˜¯Javaå¤šæ€æ€§çš„ä¸åŒè¡¨ç°ã€‚
 *   é‡å†™Overridingæ˜¯çˆ¶ç±»ä¸å­ç±»ä¹‹é—´å¤šæ€æ€§çš„ä¸€ç§è¡¨ç°ï¼Œé‡è½½Overloadingæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç±»ä¸­å¤šæ€æ€§çš„ä¸€ç§è¡¨ç°ã€‚
 *   å¦‚æœåœ¨å­ç±»ä¸­å®šä¹‰æŸæ–¹æ³•ä¸å…¶çˆ¶ç±»æœ‰ç›¸åŒçš„åç§°å’Œå‚æ•°ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬è¯´è¯¥æ–¹æ³•è¢«é‡å†™ (Overriding)ã€‚
 *   å­ç±»çš„å¯¹è±¡ä½¿ç”¨è¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•æ—¶ï¼Œå°†è°ƒç”¨å­ç±»ä¸­çš„å®šä¹‰ï¼Œå¯¹å®ƒè€Œè¨€ï¼Œçˆ¶ç±»ä¸­çš„å®šä¹‰å¦‚åŒè¢«"å±è”½"äº†ã€‚
 *   å¦‚æœåœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªç±»ä¸­å®šä¹‰äº†å¤šä¸ªåŒåçš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå®ƒä»¬æˆ–æœ‰ä¸åŒçš„å‚æ•°ä¸ªæ•°æˆ–æœ‰ä¸åŒçš„å‚æ•°ç±»å‹ï¼Œåˆ™ç§°ä¸ºæ–¹æ³•çš„é‡è½½(Overloading)ã€‚
 * 
 */
public class PersonTest {


 public static void main(String[] args) {
  Student s = new Student("è®¡ç®—æœºç§‘å­¦ä¸æŠ€æœ¯");
  s.eat();
  s.walk(10);
  
  s.study();
 }
}

 * 2.ä¿®æ”¹ç»ƒä¹ 1.2ä¸­å®šä¹‰çš„ç±»Kidsï¼Œåœ¨Kidsä¸­é‡æ–°å®šä¹‰employeed()æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œ

 *   è¾“å‡ºâ€œKids should study and no job.â€

public class Kids extends ManKind{

 private int yearsOld; //å¹´é™
 
 public Kids() {

 }

 public Kids(int yearsOld) {
  this.yearsOld = yearsOld;
 }

 public int getYearsOld() {
  return yearsOld;
 }

 public void setYearsOld(int yearsOld) {
  this.yearsOld = yearsOld;
 }

 public void printAge(){
  System.out.println("I am " + yearsOld);
 }
 
 public void employeed(){
  System.out.println("Kids should study and no job.");
 }
}

                                                                            MindKidsç±»

                                                                            public class ManKind {

 private int sex; //æ€§åˆ«
 private int salary; //è–ªèµ„
 
 public ManKind() {
  
 }

 public ManKind(int sex, int salary) {
  this.sex = sex;
  this.salary = salary;
 }

 public void manOrWoman(){
  if(sex==1){
   System.out.println("man");
  }else if(sex==0){
   System.out.println("woman");
  }
 }
 
 public void employeed(){
  if(salary==0){
   System.out.println("no job");
  }else if(salary!=0){
   System.out.println("job");
  }
 }

 public int getSex() {
  return sex;
 }

 public void setSex(int sex) {
  this.sex = sex;
 }

 public int getSalary() {
  return salary;
 }

 public void setSalary(int salary) {
  this.salary = salary;
 }
 
}

                                                                            æµ‹è¯•ç±»

                                                                            public class KidsTest {
 public static void main(String[] args) {
  
  Kids someKid = new Kids(12);
  
  someKid.printAge();
  
  someKid.setYearsOld(15);
  someKid.setSalary(0);
  someKid.setSex(1);
  
  someKid.employeed();
  someKid.manOrWoman();
 }
}

                                                                            # 03ã€å››ç§è®¿é—®æƒé™ä¿®é¥°ç¬¦

                                                                            å››ç§æƒé™ä¿®é¥°ç¬¦

                                                                            Orderç±»

                                                                            package githubb;
/*
 * ä½“ä¼šå››ç§ä¸åŒçš„æƒé™ä¿®é¥°ç¬¦
 */
public class Order {

 private int orderPrivate;
 int orderDefault;
 protected int orderProtected;
 public int orderPublic;
 
 private void methodPrivate(){
  orderPrivate = 1;
  orderDefault = 2;
  orderProtected = 3;
  orderPublic = 4;
 }
 
 void methodDefault(){
  orderPrivate = 1;
  orderDefault = 2;
  orderProtected = 3;
  orderPublic = 4;
 }
 
 protected void methodProtected(){
  orderPrivate = 1;
  orderDefault = 2;
  orderProtected = 3;
  orderPublic = 4;
 }
 
 public void methodPublic(){
  orderPrivate = 1;
  orderDefault = 2;
  orderProtected = 3;
  orderPublic = 4;
 }
}

                                                                            Ordertestç±»

                                                                            package githubb;

public class OrderTest {
 public static void main(String[] args) {
  
  Order order = new Order();
  
  order.orderDefault = 1;
  order.orderProtected = 2;
  order.orderPublic = 3;
  
  order.methodDefault();
  order.methodProtected();
  order.methodPublic();
  
  //åŒä¸€ä¸ªåŒ…ä¸­çš„å…¶å®ƒç±»ï¼Œä¸å¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨Orderç±»ä¸­ç§æœ‰çš„å±æ€§
//  order.orderPrivate = 4; //The field Order.orderPrivate is not visible
//  order.methoPrivate();
 }
}

                                                                            package githubc;

import githubb.Order;

public class SubOrder extends Order{

 public void method(){
  orderProtected = 1;
  orderPublic = 2;
  
  methodProtected();
  methodPublic();
  
  //åœ¨ä¸åŒåŒ…çš„å­ç±»ä¸­ï¼Œä¸èƒ½è°ƒç”¨Orderç±»ä¸­å£°æ˜ä¸ºprivateå’Œç¼ºçœçš„æƒé™çš„å±æ€§ã€æ–¹æ³•
//  orderDefault = 3;
//  orderPrivate = 4;
//  
//  methodDefault();
//  methodPrivate();
 }
}

                                                                            public class Person {

 String name;
 int age;
 int id = 1003; //èº«ä»½è¯å·
 
 public Person(){
  System.out.println("æˆ‘æ— å¤„ä¸åœ¨");
 }
 
 public Person(String name){
  this.name = name;
 }
 
 public Person(String name,int age){
  this(name);
  this.age = age;
 }
 
 public void eat(){
  System.out.println("äººï¼Œåƒé¥­");
 }
 
 public void walk(){
  System.out.println("äººï¼Œèµ°è·¯");
 }
}

                                                                            Studentç±»

                                                                            public class Student extends Person{
 
 String major;
 int id = 1002; //å­¦å·
 
 public Student(){

 }
 
 public Student(String name,int age,String major){
//  this.age = age;
//  this.name = name;
  super(name,age);
  this.major = major;
 }
 
 public Student(String major){
  this.major = major;
 }
 
 public void eat(){
  System.out.println("å­¦ç”Ÿå¤šåƒæœ‰è¥å…»çš„é£Ÿç‰©");
 }
 
 public void Study(){
  System.out.println("å­¦ç”Ÿï¼Œå­¦ä¹ çŸ¥è¯†ã€‚");
  this.eat();
  //å¦‚æœï¼Œæƒ³è°ƒç”¨çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­è¢«é‡å†™çš„ï¼Œä¸æƒ³è°ƒç”¨å­ç±»ä¸­çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ï¼š
  super.eat();
  super.walk();//å­çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­æœªé‡å†™çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œç”¨"this."æˆ–"super."è°ƒç”¨éƒ½å¯ä»¥
 }
 public void show(){
  System.out.println("name = " + this.name + ",age = " + super.age);
  System.out.println("id = " + this.id); 
  System.out.println("id = " + super.id);
 }
}

                                                                            æµ‹è¯•ç±»

                                                                            /*
 * superå…³é”®å­—çš„ä½¿ç”¨
 * 1.superç†è§£ä¸º:çˆ¶ç±»çš„
 * 2.superå¯ä»¥ç”¨æ¥è°ƒç”¨:å±æ€§ã€æ–¹æ³•ã€æ„é€ å™¨ 
 * 
 * 3.superçš„ä½¿ç”¨
 *   3.1 æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥åœ¨å­ç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•æˆ–æ„é€ å™¨ä¸­ï¼Œé€šè¿‡"super.å±æ€§"æˆ–"super.æ–¹æ³•"çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼Œæ˜¾å¼çš„è°ƒç”¨
 *  çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­å£°æ˜çš„å±æ€§æˆ–æ–¹æ³•ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯ï¼Œé€šå¸¸æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä¹ æƒ¯å»çœç•¥è¿™ä¸ª"super."
 *   3.2 ç‰¹æ®Šæƒ…å†µ:å½“å­ç±»å’Œçˆ¶ç±»ä¸­å®šä¹‰äº†åŒåçš„å±æ€§æ—¶ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬è¦æƒ³åœ¨å­ç±»ä¸­è°ƒç”¨çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­å£°æ˜çš„å±æ€§ï¼Œåˆ™å¿…é¡»æ˜¾å¼çš„ 
 *  ä½¿ç”¨"super.å±æ€§"çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼Œè¡¨æ˜è°ƒç”¨çš„æ˜¯çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­å£°æ˜çš„å±æ€§ã€‚
 *   3.3 ç‰¹æ®Šæƒ…å†µ:å½“å­ç±»é‡å†™äº†çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­çš„æ–¹æ³•åï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æƒ³åœ¨å­ç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•ä¸­è°ƒç”¨çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­è¢«é‡å†™çš„æ–¹æ³•æ—¶ï¼Œå¿…é¡»æ˜¾å¼çš„
 *  ä½¿ç”¨"super.æ–¹æ³•"çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼Œè¡¨æ˜è°ƒç”¨çš„æ˜¯çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­è¢«é‡å†™çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚
 * 
 * 4.superè°ƒç”¨æ„é€ å™¨
 *    4.1  æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥åœ¨å­ç±»çš„æ„é€ å™¨ä¸­æ˜¾å¼çš„ä½¿ç”¨"super(å½¢å‚åˆ—è¡¨)"çš„æ–¹å¼,è°ƒç”¨çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­å£°æ˜çš„æŒ‡å®šçš„æ„é€ å™¨
 *    4.2 "super(å½¢å‚åˆ—è¡¨)"çš„ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå¿…é¡»å£°æ˜åœ¨å­ç±»æ„é€ å™¨çš„é¦–è¡Œï¼
 *    4.3 æˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨ç±»çš„æ„é€ å™¨ä¸­ï¼Œé’ˆå¯¹äº"this(å½¢å‚åˆ—è¡¨)"æˆ–"super(å½¢å‚åˆ—è¡¨)"åªèƒ½äºŒé€‰ä¸€ï¼Œä¸èƒ½åŒæ—¶å‡ºç°ã€‚
 *    4.4 åœ¨æ„é€ å™¨çš„é¦–è¡Œï¼Œæ—¢æ²¡æœ‰æ˜¾å¼çš„å£°æ˜"this(å½¢å‚åˆ—è¡¨)"æˆ–"super(å½¢å‚åˆ—è¡¨)",åˆ™é»˜è®¤çš„è°ƒç”¨çš„æ˜¯çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­çš„ç©ºå‚æ„é€ å™¨ã€‚super()
 *    4.5 åœ¨ç±»çš„å¤šä¸ªæ„é€ å™¨ä¸­ï¼Œè‡³å°‘æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªç±»çš„æ„é€ å™¨ä½¿ç”¨äº†"super(å½¢å‚åˆ—è¡¨)",è°ƒç”¨çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­çš„æ„é€ å™¨ã€‚
 *  
 */
public class SuperTest {
 public static void main(String[] args) {
  
  Student s = new Student();
  s.show();
  
  s.Study();
  
  Student s1 = new Student("Ton",21,"IT" );
  s1.show();
  
  System.out.println("***********************");
  Student s2 = new Student();
  
 }
}

                                                                            # 05ã€å­ç±»å¯¹è±¡å®ä¾‹åŒ–è¿‡ç¨‹

                                                                            /*
 * å­ç±»å¯¹è±¡å®ä¾‹åŒ–çš„å…¨è¿‡ç¨‹
 * 
 * 1.ä»ç»“æœä¸Šçœ‹:
 *   å­ç±»ç»§æ‰¿çˆ¶ç±»ä»¥åï¼Œå°±è·å–äº†çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­å£°æ˜çš„å±æ€§æˆ–æ–¹æ³•ã€‚
 *   åˆ›å»ºå­ç±»çš„å¯¹è±¡ä¸­ï¼Œåœ¨å †ç©ºé—´ä¸­ï¼Œå°±ä¼šåŠ è½½æ‰€æœ‰çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­å£°æ˜çš„å±æ€§ã€‚
 * 
 * 2.ä»è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸Šçœ‹:
 *   å½“æˆ‘ä»¬é€šè¿‡å­ç±»çš„æ„é€ å™¨åˆ›å»ºå­ç±»å¯¹è±¡æ—¶,æˆ‘ä»¬ä¸€å®šä¼šç›´æ¥æˆ–é—´æ¥çš„è°ƒç”¨å…¶çˆ¶ç±»æ„é€ å™¨ï¼Œ 
 *   ç›´åˆ°è°ƒç”¨äº†java.lang.Objectç±»ä¸­ç©ºå‚çš„æ„é€ å™¨ä¸ºæ­¢ã€‚æ­£å› ä¸ºåŠ è½½è¿‡æ‰€æœ‰çš„çˆ¶ç±»ç»“æ„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ‰å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°å†…å­˜ä¸­æœ‰
 *   çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­çš„ç»“æ„ï¼Œå­ç±»å¯¹è±¡å¯ä»¥è€ƒè™‘è¿›è¡Œè°ƒç”¨ã€‚

                                                                            ç»ƒä¹ 

                                                                            Accountç±»

                                                                            /*
 * å†™ä¸€ä¸ªåä¸ºAccountçš„ç±»æ¨¡æ‹Ÿè´¦æˆ·ã€‚è¯¥ç±»çš„å±æ€§å’Œæ–¹æ³•å¦‚ä¸‹å›¾æ‰€ç¤ºã€‚
 * è¯¥ç±»åŒ…æ‹¬çš„å±æ€§ï¼šè´¦å·idï¼Œä½™é¢balanceï¼Œå¹´åˆ©ç‡annualInterestRateï¼›
 * åŒ…å«çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼šè®¿é—®å™¨æ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆgetterå’Œsetteræ–¹æ³•ï¼‰ï¼Œ
 * è¿”å›æœˆåˆ©ç‡çš„æ–¹æ³•getMonthlyInterest()ï¼Œ
 * å–æ¬¾æ–¹æ³•withdraw()ï¼Œå­˜æ¬¾æ–¹æ³•deposit()ã€‚
 * 
 */
public class Account {

 private int id; //è´¦å·
 private double balance; //ä½™é¢
 private double annualInterestRate; //å¹´åˆ©ç‡
 
 public Account(int id, double balance, double annualInterestRate) {
  super();
  this.id = id;
  this.balance = balance;
  this.annualInterestRate = annualInterestRate;
 }

 public int getId() {
  return id;
 }

 public void setId(int id) {
  this.id = id;
 }

 public double getBalance() {
  return balance;
 }

 public void setBalance(double balance) {
  this.balance = balance;
 }

 public double getAnnualInterestRate() {
  return annualInterestRate;
 }

 public void setAnnualInterestRate(double annualInterestRate) {
  this.annualInterestRate = annualInterestRate;
 }
 
 public double getMonthlyInterest(){ //è¿”å›æœˆåˆ©ç‡çš„æ–¹æ³•
  return annualInterestRate / 12;
 }
 
 public void withdraw (double amount){ //å–æ¬¾æ–¹æ³•
  if(balance >= amount){
   balance -= amount;
   return;
  }
  System.out.println("ä½™é¢ä¸è¶³");
 }
 
 public void deposit (double amount){ //å­˜æ¬¾æ–¹æ³•
  if(amount > 0){
   balance += amount;
   
  }
 }
 
}

                                                                            AccountTestç±»

                                                                            /*
 * å†™ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·ç¨‹åºæµ‹è¯•Accountç±»ã€‚åœ¨ç”¨æˆ·ç¨‹åºä¸­ï¼Œ
 * åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªè´¦å·ä¸º1122ã€ä½™é¢ä¸º20000ã€å¹´åˆ©ç‡4.5%çš„Accountå¯¹è±¡ã€‚
 * ä½¿ç”¨withdrawæ–¹æ³•ææ¬¾30000å…ƒï¼Œå¹¶æ‰“å°ä½™é¢ã€‚å†ä½¿ç”¨withdrawæ–¹æ³•ææ¬¾2500å…ƒï¼Œ
 * ä½¿ç”¨depositæ–¹æ³•å­˜æ¬¾3000å…ƒï¼Œç„¶åæ‰“å°ä½™é¢å’Œæœˆåˆ©ç‡ã€‚
 */
public class AccountTest {
 public static void main(String[] args) {
  Account acct = new Account(1122,20000,0.045);
  
  acct.withdraw(30000);
  System.out.println("ä½ çš„è´¦æˆ·ä½™é¢ä¸º:" + acct.getBalance());
  acct.withdraw(2500);
  System.out.println("ä½ çš„è´¦æˆ·ä½™é¢ä¸º:" + acct.getBalance());
  acct.deposit(3000);
  System.out.println("ä½ çš„è´¦æˆ·ä½™é¢ä¸º:" + acct.getBalance());


  System.out.println("æœˆåˆ©ç‡ä¸º: " + (acct.getAnnualInterestRate() * 100) + "%");
 }
}

                                                                            CheckAccountç±»

                                                                            /*
 * åˆ›å»ºAccountç±»çš„ä¸€ä¸ªå­ç±»CheckAccountä»£è¡¨å¯é€æ”¯çš„è´¦æˆ·ï¼Œè¯¥è´¦æˆ·ä¸­å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªå±æ€§overdraftä»£è¡¨å¯é€æ”¯é™é¢ã€‚
 * åœ¨CheckAccountç±»ä¸­é‡å†™withdrawæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå…¶ç®—æ³•å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š
 * å¦‚æœï¼ˆå–æ¬¾é‡‘é¢<è´¦æˆ·ä½™é¢ï¼‰ï¼Œ
 * å¯ç›´æ¥å–æ¬¾
 * å¦‚æœï¼ˆå–æ¬¾é‡‘é¢>è´¦æˆ·ä½™é¢ï¼‰ï¼Œ
 * è®¡ç®—éœ€è¦é€æ”¯çš„é¢åº¦
 * åˆ¤æ–­å¯é€æ”¯é¢overdraftæ˜¯å¦è¶³å¤Ÿæ”¯ä»˜æœ¬æ¬¡é€æ”¯éœ€è¦ï¼Œå¦‚æœå¯ä»¥
 *   å°†è´¦æˆ·ä½™é¢ä¿®æ”¹ä¸º0ï¼Œå†²å‡å¯é€æ”¯é‡‘é¢
 * å¦‚æœä¸å¯ä»¥
 *   æç¤ºç”¨æˆ·è¶…è¿‡å¯é€æ”¯é¢çš„é™é¢
 * 
 */
public class CheckAccount extends Account{

 private double overdraft; //ä»£è¡¨å¯é€æ”¯é™é¢
 
 public CheckAccount(int id, double balance, double annualInterestRate,double overdraft){
  super(id, balance, annualInterestRate);
  this.overdraft = overdraft;
 }
 
 public double getOverdraft() {
  return overdraft;
 }

 public void setOverdraft(double overdraft) {
  this.overdraft = overdraft;
 }

 @Override
 public void withdraw(double amount) {
  if(getBalance() >= amount){ //ä½™é¢è¶³å¤Ÿæ¶ˆè´¹
   //æ–¹å¼ä¸€
//   setBalance(getBalance() - amount); 
   //æ–¹å¼äºŒ
   super.withdraw(amount);
  }else if(overdraft >= amount - getBalance()){ //ä½™é¢ä¸å¤Ÿ
   
   overdraft -= (amount - getBalance());
//   setBalance(0);
   //æˆ–
   super.withdraw(getBalance());
   
  }else{ //è¶…è¿‡å¯é€æ”¯é™é¢
   System.out.println("è¶…è¿‡å¯é€æ”¯é™é¢ï¼");
  }
  
 }
}

                                                                            CheckAccountTestç±»

                                                                            /*
 * å†™ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·ç¨‹åºæµ‹è¯•CheckAccountç±»ã€‚åœ¨ç”¨æˆ·ç¨‹åºä¸­ï¼Œ
 * åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªè´¦å·ä¸º1122ã€ä½™é¢ä¸º20000ã€å¹´åˆ©ç‡4.5%ï¼Œ
 * å¯é€æ”¯é™é¢ä¸º5000å…ƒçš„CheckAccountå¯¹è±¡ã€‚
 * ä½¿ç”¨withdrawæ–¹æ³•ææ¬¾5000å…ƒï¼Œå¹¶æ‰“å°è´¦æˆ·ä½™é¢å’Œå¯é€æ”¯é¢ã€‚

public class CheckAccountTest {

  System.out.println("æ‚¨çš„è´¦æˆ·ä½™é¢ä¸º: " + cat.getBalance());
  System.out.println("æ‚¨çš„å¯é€æ”¯é¢åº¦ä¸º: " + cat.getOverdraft());
  
  cat.withdraw(18000);
  System.out.println("æ‚¨çš„è´¦æˆ·ä½™é¢ä¸º: " + cat.getBalance());
  System.out.println("æ‚¨çš„å¯é€æ”¯é¢åº¦ä¸º: " + cat.getOverdraft());
  
  cat.withdraw(3000);
  System.out.println("æ‚¨çš„è´¦æˆ·ä½™é¢ä¸º: " + cat.getBalance());
  System.out.println("æ‚¨çš„å¯é€æ”¯é¢åº¦ä¸º: " + cat.getOverdraft());
 }
}

/*
 * 2.ä»ç¼–è¯‘å’Œè¿è¡Œçš„è§’åº¦çœ‹ï¼š

 * å¯¹äºç¼–è¯‘å™¨è€Œè¨€ï¼Œè¿™äº›åŒåæ–¹æ³•å°±æˆäº†ä¸åŒçš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

 * ç¼–è¯‘å™¨å°±å·²ç»ç¡®å®šäº†æ‰€è¦è°ƒç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè¿™ç§°ä¸ºâ€œæ—©ç»‘å®šâ€æˆ–â€œé™æ€ç»‘å®šâ€ï¼›
 * è€Œå¯¹äºå¤šæ€ï¼Œåªæœ‰ç­‰åˆ°æ–¹æ³•è°ƒç”¨çš„é‚£ä¸€åˆ»ï¼Œè§£é‡Šè¿è¡Œå™¨æ‰ä¼šç¡®å®šæ‰€è¦è°ƒç”¨çš„å…·ä½“æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œ
 * è¿™ç§°ä¸ºâ€œæ™šç»‘å®šâ€æˆ–â€œåŠ¨æ€ç»‘å®šâ€ã€‚

 * å¼•ç”¨ä¸€å¥Bruce Eckelçš„è¯ï¼šâ€œä¸è¦çŠ¯å‚»ï¼Œå¦‚æœå®ƒä¸æ˜¯æ™šç»‘å®šï¼Œå®ƒå°±ä¸æ˜¯å¤šæ€ã€‚â€

//é¢è¯•é¢˜ï¼šå¤šæ€æ˜¯ç¼–è¯‘æ—¶è¡Œä¸ºè¿˜æ˜¯è¿è¡Œæ—¶è¡Œä¸ºï¼Ÿ

class Animal  {
 
 protected void eat() {
  System.out.println("animal eat food");
 }
}

class Cat  extends Animal  {
 
 protected void eat() {
  System.out.println("cat eat fish");
 }
}

class Dog  extends Animal  {
 
 public void eat() {
  System.out.println("Dog eat bone");

 }

}

class Sheep  extends Animal  {
 
 public void eat() {
  System.out.println("Sheep eat grass");

 }
 
}

public class InterviewTest {

 public static Animal  getInstance(int key) {
  switch (key) {
  case 0:
   return new Cat ();
  case 1:
   return new Dog ();
  default:
   return new Sheep ();
  }

 }

 public static void main(String[] args) {
  int key = new Random().nextInt(3);

  System.out.println(key);

  Animal  animal = getInstance(key);
  
  animal.eat();
   
 }

}

                                                                            /*

 *  æœ‰äº†å¯¹è±¡å¤šæ€æ€§ä»¥åï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨ç¼–è¯‘æœŸï¼Œåªèƒ½è°ƒç”¨çˆ¶ç±»å£°æ˜çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä½†åœ¨æ‰§è¡ŒæœŸå®é™…æ‰§è¡Œçš„æ˜¯å­ç±»é‡å†™çˆ¶ç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•

 *  è‹¥ç¼–è¯‘æ—¶ç±»å‹å’Œè¿è¡Œæ—¶ç±»å‹ä¸ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œå°±å‡ºç°äº†å¯¹è±¡çš„å¤šæ€æ€§(Polymorphism)ïƒ˜

 *   â€œçœ‹å³è¾¹â€ï¼šçœ‹çš„æ˜¯å­ç±»çš„å¯¹è±¡ï¼ˆå®é™…è¿è¡Œçš„æ˜¯å­ç±»é‡å†™çˆ¶ç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼‰

 *  4.å¤šæ€æ€§çš„ä½¿ç”¨å‰æï¼š
 *   â‘  ç±»çš„ç»§æ‰¿å…³ç³»
 *   â‘¡ æ–¹æ³•çš„é‡å†™
 *  5.å¯¹è±¡çš„å¤šæ€æ€§:åªé€‚ç”¨äºæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä¸é€‚ç”¨äºå±æ€§(ç¼–è¯‘å’Œè¿è¡Œéƒ½çœ‹å·¦è¾¹)
 */
public class PersonTest {
 public static void main(String[] args) {

  Person p1 = new Person();
  p1.eat();

  Man man = new Man();
  man.eat();
  man.age = 25;
  man.earnMoney();

  // ************************************
  System.out.println("************************");
  // å¯¹è±¡çš„å¤šæ€æ€§ï¼Œçˆ¶ç±»çš„å¼•ç”¨æŒ‡å‘å­ç±»çš„å¯¹è±¡
  Person p2 = new Man();
  // Person p3 = new Woman();

  // å¤šæ€çš„ä½¿ç”¨:å½“è°ƒç”¨å­çˆ¶ç±»åŒååŒå‚æ•°æ–¹æ³•æ—¶ï¼Œå®é™…è°ƒç”¨çš„æ˜¯å­ç±»é‡å†™çˆ¶ç±»çš„æ–¹æ³•---è™šæ‹Ÿæ–¹æ³•è°ƒç”¨
  p2.eat();
  p2.walk();

  // p2.earnMoney();

  System.out.println("**************************");
  // ä¸èƒ½è°ƒç”¨å­ç±»æ‰€ç‰¹æœ‰çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€å±æ€§ï¼Œç¼–è¯‘æ—¶ï¼Œp2æ˜¯Personç±»å‹ï¼Œ

  // p2.earnMoney();

  p2.name = "Tom";
  // p2.isSmoking = true;
  // æœ‰äº†å¯¹è±¡çš„å¤šæ€æ€§ä»¥åï¼Œå†…å­˜ä¸­å®é™…ä¸Šæ˜¯åŠ è½½äº†å­ç±»ç‰¹æœ‰çš„å±æ€§å’Œæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ç”±äºå˜é‡å£°æ˜ä¸ºçˆ¶ç±»ç±»å‹ï¼Œå¯¼è‡´
  // ç¼–è¯‘æ—¶ï¼Œåªèƒ½è°ƒç”¨çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­å£°æ˜çš„å±æ€§å’Œæ–¹æ³•ã€‚å­ç±»çš„å±æ€§å’Œæ–¹æ³•ä¸èƒ½è°ƒç”¨ã€‚

  // å¦‚ä½•æ‰èƒ½è°ƒç”¨å­ç±»æ‰€ç‰¹æœ‰çš„å±æ€§å’Œæ–¹æ³•ï¼Ÿ
  // ä½¿ç”¨å¼ºåˆ¶ç±»å‹è½¬æ¢ç¬¦ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ç§°ä¸º:å‘ä¸‹è½¬å‹
  Man m1 = (Man) p2;
  m1.earnMoney();
  m1.isSmoking = true;

  // ä½¿ç”¨å¼ºè½¬æ—¶ï¼Œå¯èƒ½å‡ºç°ClassCastExceptionå¼‚å¸¸
  // Woman w1 = (Woman)p2;
  // w1.goShopping();

  /*
   * instanceofå…³é”®å­—çš„ä½¿ç”¨
   * 
   * a instanceof A:åˆ¤æ–­å¯¹è±¡aæ˜¯å¦æ˜¯ç±»Açš„å®ä¾‹ã€‚å¦‚æœï¼Œè¿”å›trueï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸æ˜¯ï¼Œè¿”å›false;
   * 
   * ä½¿ç”¨æƒ…å¢ƒ:ä¸ºäº†é¿å…åœ¨å‘ä¸‹è½¬å‹æ—¶å‡ºç°ClassCastExceptionå¼‚å¸¸ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨è¿›è¡Œå‘ä¸‹è½¬å‹ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œå…ˆè¿›è¡Œ
   * instanceofçš„åˆ¤æ–­,ä¸€æ—¦è¿”å›true,å°±è¿›è¡Œå‘ä¸‹è½¬å‹ã€‚å¦‚æœè¿”å›falseï¼Œä¸è¿›è¡Œå‘ä¸‹è½¬å‹ã€‚
   * 
   * å¦‚æœa instanceof Aè¿”å›true,åˆ™a instanceof Bä¹Ÿè¿”å›trueã€‚ å…¶ä¸­ç±»Bæ˜¯ç±»Açš„çˆ¶ç±»ã€‚
   * 
   */

  if (p2 instanceof Woman) {
   Woman w1 = (Woman) p2;
   w1.goShopping();
   System.out.println("**********Woman*********");
  }

  if (p2 instanceof Man) {
   Man m2 = (Man) p2;
   m2.earnMoney();
   System.out.println("*********Man************");
  }

  if (p2 instanceof Person) {
   System.out.println("***********Person************");
  }

  if (p2 instanceof Object) {
   System.out.println("***********object************");
  }
  
  //å‘ä¸‹è½¬å‹çš„å¸¸è§é—®é¢˜
  //ç»ƒä¹ 
  //é—®é¢˜1:ç¼–è¯‘æ—¶é€šè¿‡ï¼Œè¿è¡Œæ—¶ä¸é€šè¿‡
  //ä¸¾ä¾‹ä¸€
//  Person p3 = new Woman();
//  Man m3 = (Man)p3;
  
  //ä¸¾ä¾‹äºŒ
  Person p4 = new Person();
  Man m4 = (Man)p4;
  
  //é—®é¢˜äºŒ:ç¼–è¯‘é€šè¿‡ï¼Œè¿è¡Œæ—¶ä¹Ÿé€šè¿‡
  Object obj = new Woman();
  Person p = (Person)obj;
  
  //é—®é¢˜ä¸‰:ç¼–è¯‘ä¸é€šè¿‡
//  Man m5 = new woman();
  
//  String str = new Date();
  
//  Object o = new Date();
//  String str1 = (String)o;
 }
}

                                                                            # 6.3ã€å¤šæ€æ€§çš„ç»ƒä¹ 

                                                                            1ã€ç»ƒä¹ 1

                                                                            /*
 * ç»ƒä¹ :å­ç±»ç»§æ‰¿çˆ¶ç±»ïƒ˜
 * 
 * 1.è‹¥å­ç±»é‡å†™äº†çˆ¶ç±»æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå°±æ„å‘³ç€å­ç±»é‡Œå®šä¹‰çš„æ–¹æ³•å½»åº•è¦†ç›–äº†çˆ¶ç±»é‡Œçš„åŒåæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œ
 * ç³»ç»Ÿå°†ä¸å¯èƒ½æŠŠçˆ¶ç±»é‡Œçš„æ–¹æ³•è½¬ç§»åˆ°å­ç±»ä¸­ã€‚
 * 
 * 2.å¯¹äºå®ä¾‹å˜é‡åˆ™ä¸å­˜åœ¨è¿™æ ·çš„ç°è±¡ï¼Œå³ä½¿å­ç±»é‡Œå®šä¹‰äº†ä¸çˆ¶ç±»å®Œå…¨ç›¸åŒçš„å®ä¾‹å˜é‡ï¼Œ
 * è¿™ä¸ªå®ä¾‹å˜é‡ä¾ç„¶ä¸å¯èƒ½è¦†ç›–çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­å®šä¹‰çš„å®ä¾‹å˜é‡
 * 
 */
public class FieldMethodTest {
 public static void main(String[] args){
  Sub s= new Sub();
  System.out.println(s.count); //20
  s.display();//20
  
  Base b = s;
  //==:å¯¹äºå¼•ç”¨æ•°æ®ç±»å‹æ¥è®²ï¼Œæ¯”è¾ƒçš„æ˜¯ä¸¤ä¸ªå¼•ç”¨æ•°æ®ç±»å‹å˜é‡çš„åœ°å€å€¼æ˜¯å¦ä¸€æ ·ã€‚
  System.out.println(b == s); //true
  System.out.println(b.count); //10
  b.display();
 }
}

class Base {
 int count= 10;
 public void display() {
  System.out.println(this.count);
 }
}

class Sub extends Base {
 int count= 20;
 public void display() {
  System.out.println(this.count);
 }
}

                                                                            2ã€ç»ƒä¹ 2

                                                                            /*
 * å»ºç«‹InstanceTest ç±»ï¼Œåœ¨ç±»ä¸­å®šä¹‰æ–¹æ³•method(Person e);
 * 
 * åœ¨methodä¸­:
 * (1)æ ¹æ®eçš„ç±»å‹è°ƒç”¨ç›¸åº”ç±»çš„getInfo()æ–¹æ³•ã€‚
 * (2)æ ¹æ®eçš„ç±»å‹æ‰§è¡Œï¼š
 *   å¦‚æœeä¸ºPersonç±»çš„å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºï¼šâ€œa personâ€;
 *   å¦‚æœeä¸ºStudentç±»çš„å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºï¼šâ€œa studentâ€â€œa person â€
 *   å¦‚æœeä¸ºGraduateç±»çš„å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºï¼šâ€œa graduated studentâ€
 *   â€œa studentâ€ â€œa personâ€
 * 
 */
class Person {
 protected String name = "person";
 protected int age = 50;


 public String getInfo() {
  return "Name: " + name + "\n" + "age: " + age;
 }
}

class Student extends Person {
 protected String school = "pku";

 public String getInfo() {
  return "Name: " + name + "\nage: " + age + "\nschool: " + school;
 }
}

class Graduate extends Student {
 public String major = "IT";

 public String getInfo() {
  return "Name: " + name + "\nage: " + age + "\nschool: " + school + "\nmajor:" + major;
 }
}


public class InstanceTest{
 
 public static void main(String[] args) {
  //è™šæ‹Ÿæ–¹æ³•è°ƒç”¨
  InstanceTest test = new InstanceTest();
  test.method(new Student());
  
 }
 
 public void method(Person e){
  String info = e.getInfo();
  System.out.println(info);
  
  //æ–¹æ³•ä¸€
  if(e instanceof Graduate){
   System.out.println("a graduated student");
   System.out.println("a student");
   System.out.println("a person");
  }else if(e instanceof Student){
   System.out.println("a student");
   System.out.println("a person");
  }else{
   System.out.println("a person");
  }
  
  //æ–¹æ³•äºŒ
  if(e instanceof Graduate){
   System.out.println("a graduated student");
  }
  if(e instanceof Student){
   System.out.println("a student");
  }
  if(e instanceof Person){
   System.out.println("a person");
  }
 }
}

                                                                            3ã€ç»ƒä¹ 3

                                                                            GeometricObjectç±»open in new window

                                                                            /*
 * å®šä¹‰ä¸‰ä¸ªç±»ï¼Œçˆ¶ç±»GeometricObjectä»£è¡¨å‡ ä½•å½¢çŠ¶ï¼Œå­ç±»Circleä»£è¡¨åœ†å½¢ï¼ŒMyRectangleä»£è¡¨çŸ©å½¢ã€‚
 */
public class GeometricObject {
 protected String color;
 protected double weight;
 public String getColor() {
  return color;
 }
 public void setColor(String color) {
  this.color = color;
 }
 public double getWeight() {
  return weight;
 }
 public void setWeight(double weight) {
  this.weight = weight;
 }
 public GeometricObject(String color, double weight) {
  super();
  this.color = color;
  this.weight = weight;
 }
 
 public double findArea(){
  return 0.0;
 }
}

                                                                            Circleç±»

                                                                            public class Circle extends GeometricObject {

 private double radius;
 
 public Circle(double weight,String color, double radius) {
  super(color,weight);
  this.radius = radius;
 }

 public double getRadius() {
  return radius;
 }

 public void setRadius(double radius) {
  this.radius = radius;
 }
 
 @Override
 public double findArea() {
  return 3.14 * radius * radius;
 }
}

                                                                            MyRectangleç±»

                                                                            public class MyRectangle extends GeometricObject {

 private double width;
 private double height;
 
 public MyRectangle(double width, double height,String color,double weight) {
  super(color, weight);
  this.height = height;
  this.width = width;
 }

 public double getWidth() {
  return width;
 }

 public void setWidth(double width) {
  this.width = width;
 }

 public double getHeight() {
  return height;
 }

 public void setHeight(double height) {
  this.height = height;
 }

 @Override
 public double findArea() {
  return width * height;
 }
}

                                                                            GeometricTestç±»

                                                                            /*
 * å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªæµ‹è¯•ç±»GeometricTestï¼Œç¼–å†™equalsAreaæ–¹æ³•æµ‹è¯•ä¸¤ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡çš„é¢ç§¯æ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰ï¼ˆæ³¨æ„æ–¹æ³•çš„å‚æ•°ç±»å‹ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨åŠ¨æ€ç»‘å®šæŠ€æœ¯ï¼‰ï¼Œ
 * ç¼–å†™displayGeometricObjectæ–¹æ³•æ˜¾ç¤ºå¯¹è±¡çš„é¢ç§¯ï¼ˆæ³¨æ„æ–¹æ³•çš„å‚æ•°ç±»å‹ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨åŠ¨æ€ç»‘å®šæŠ€æœ¯ï¼‰ã€‚
 * 
 */
public class GeometricTest {
 
 public static void main(String[] args) {
  GeometricTest test = new GeometricTest();
  
  Circle c1 = new Circle(2.3,"white",1.0);
  test.displayGeometricObject(c1);
  
  Circle c2 = new Circle(3.3,"white",1.0);
  test.displayGeometricObject(c2);
  
  boolean isEqual = test.equalsArea(c1, c2);
  System.out.println("é¢ç§¯æ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰: " + isEqual);
  
  MyRectangle rect = new MyRectangle(2.1, 3.4,"red",1.0);
  test.displayGeometricObject(rect);
 }
 
 public void displayGeometricObject(GeometricObject o){
  System.out.println("é¢ç§¯ä¸º: " + o.findArea());
 }
 
 //æµ‹è¯•ä¸¤ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡çš„é¢ç§¯æ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰
 public boolean equalsArea(GeometricObject o1,GeometricObject o2){
  return o1.findArea() == o2.findArea();
 }
}

import java.util.Random;

class Animal  {

 protected void eat() {
  System.out.println("animal eat food");
 }
}

class Cat  extends Animal  {

 protected void eat() {
  System.out.println("cat eat fish");
 }
}

class Dog  extends Animal  {

 public void eat() {
  System.out.println("Dog eat bone");
 }
}

class Sheep  extends Animal  {

 public void eat() {
  System.out.println("Sheep eat grass");

 }

}

public class InterviewTest {

 public static Animal  getInstance(int key) {
  switch (key) {
  case 0:
   return new Cat ();
  case 1:
   return new Dog ();
  default:
   return new Sheep ();
  }

 }

 public static void main(String[] args) {
  int key = new Random().nextInt(3);

  System.out.println(key);

  Animal  animal = getInstance(key);
  
  animal.eat();
   
 }
}

                                                                            # 7.2ã€==æ“ä½œç¬¦ä¸equalsopen in new windowæ–¹æ³•

                                                                            import java.sql.Date;

/*
 * é¢è¯•é¢˜: ==å’Œequalsçš„åŒºåˆ«
 * 
 * ä¸€ã€å›é¡¾==çš„ä½¿ç”¨
 * == : è¿ç®—ç¬¦
 * 1.å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨åœ¨åŸºæœ¬æ•°æ®ç±»å‹å˜é‡å’Œå¼•ç”¨æ•°æ®ç±»å‹å˜é‡ä¸­
 * 2.å¦‚æœæ¯”è¾ƒçš„æ˜¯åŸºæœ¬æ•°æ®ç±»å‹å˜é‡ï¼šæ¯”è¾ƒä¸¤ä¸ªå˜é‡ä¿å­˜çš„æ•°æ®æ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰ã€‚(ä¸ä¸€å®šç±»å‹è¦ç›¸åŒ)
 *     å¦‚æœæ¯”è¾ƒçš„æ˜¯å¼•ç”¨æ•°æ®ç±»å‹å˜é‡ï¼šæ¯”è¾ƒä¸¤ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡çš„åœ°å€å€¼æ˜¯å¦ç›¸åŒ,å³ä¸¤ä¸ªå¼•ç”¨æ˜¯å¦æŒ‡å‘åŒä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡å®ä½“
 *  è¡¥å……: == ç¬¦å·ä½¿ç”¨æ—¶ï¼Œå¿…é¡»ä¿è¯ç¬¦å·å·¦å³ä¸¤è¾¹çš„å˜é‡ç±»å‹ä¸€è‡´ã€‚
 *
 * äºŒã€equals()æ–¹æ³•çš„ä½¿ç”¨
 * 1.æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè€Œéè¿ç®—ç¬¦
 * 2.åªèƒ½é€‚ç”¨äºå¼•ç”¨æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ã€‚
 * 3.Objectç±»ä¸­equals()çš„å®šä¹‰ï¼š
 *   public boolean equals(Object obj){
 *    return (this == obj);
 *   }
 * è¯´æ˜ï¼šObjectç±»ä¸­å®šä¹‰çš„equals()å’Œ==çš„ä½œç”¨æ˜¯ç›¸åŒçš„ï¼Œæ¯”è¾ƒä¸¤ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡çš„åœ°å€å€¼æ˜¯å¦ç›¸åŒï¼Œå³ä¸¤ä¸ªå¼•ç”¨æ˜¯å¦æŒ‡å‘åŒä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡å®ä½“ã€‚
 * 
 * 4.åƒStringã€Dateã€Fileã€åŒ…è£…ç±»ç­‰éƒ½é‡å†™äº†Objectç±»ä¸­çš„equals()æ–¹æ³•.
 *   ä¸¤ä¸ªå¼•ç”¨çš„åœ°å€æ˜¯å¦ç›¸åŒï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯æ¯”è¾ƒä¸¤ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡çš„â€œå®ä½“å†…å®¹â€æ˜¯å¦ç›¸åŒã€‚
 * 
 * 5.é€šå¸¸æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬è‡ªå®šä¹‰çš„ç±»å¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨equals()çš„è¯ï¼Œä¹Ÿé€šå¸¸æ˜¯æ¯”è¾ƒä¸¤ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡çš„"å®ä½“å†…å®¹"æ˜¯å¦ç›¸åŒã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬
 *     å°±éœ€è¦å¯¹Objectç±»ä¸­çš„equals()è¿›è¡Œé‡å†™ã€‚
 * 
 * é‡å†™çš„åŸåˆ™:æ¯”è¾ƒä¸¤ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡çš„å®ä½“å†…å®¹æ˜¯å¦ç›¸åŒã€‚
 * 
 */
public class EqualsTest {
 public static void main(String[] args) {
  
  //åŸºæœ¬æ•°æ®ç±»å‹
  int i = 10;
  int j = 10;
  double d = 10.0;
  System.out.println(i == j); //true
  System.out.println(i == d); //true
  
//  boolean b =true;
//  System.out.println(i == b);
  
  char c = 10;
  System.out.println(i == c); //true
  
  char c1 = 'A';
  char c2 = 65;
  System.out.println(c1 == c2); //true
  
  //å¼•ç”¨æ•°æ®ç±»å‹
  Customer cust1 = new Customer("Tom" ,21);
  Customer cust2 = new Customer("Tom" ,21);
  System.out.println(cust1 == cust2); //false
  
  String str1 = new String("BAT");
  String str2 = new String("BAT");
  System.out.println(str1 == str2); //false
  System.out.println("*************************");
  System.out.println(cust1.equals(cust2)); //false
  System.out.println(str1.equals(str2)); //true
  
  Date date1 = new Date(23432525324L);
  Date date2 = new Date(23432525324L);
  System.out.println(date1.equals(date2)); //true
 }
}

                                                                            Customerç±»

                                                                            public class Customer {
 
 private String name;
 private int age;
 public String getName() {
  return name;
 }
 public void setName(String name) {
  this.name = name;
 }
 public int getAge() {
  return age;
 }
 public void setAge(int age) {
  this.age = age;
 }
 public Customer() {
  super();
 }
 public Customer(String name, int age) {
  super();
  this.name = name;
  this.age = age;
 }


 //è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆçš„equals()
 @Override
 public boolean equals(Object obj) {
  if (this == obj)
   return true;
  if (obj == null)
   return false;
  if (getClass() != obj.getClass())
   return false;
  Customer other = (Customer) obj;
  if (age != other.age)
   return false;
  if (name == null) {
   if (other.name != null)
    return false;
  } else if (!name.equals(other.name))
   return false;
  return true;
 }
 
 //é‡å†™åŸåˆ™ï¼Œæ¯”è¾ƒä¸¤ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡çš„å®ä½“å†…å®¹(å³nameå’Œage)æ˜¯å¦ç›¸åŒ
 //æ‰‹åŠ¨å®ç°equals()çš„é‡å†™
// @Override
// public boolean equals(Object obj) {
//  
  System.out.println("Customer equals()....");
//  if(this == obj){
//   return true;
//  }
//  
//  if(obj instanceof Customer){
//   Customer cust = (Customer)obj;
//   //æ¯”è¾ƒä¸¤ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡çš„å±æ€§æ˜¯å¦éƒ½ç›¸åŒ
   if(this.age == cust.age && this.name.equals(cust.name)){
    return true;
   }else{
    return false;
   }
//   
//   //æˆ–
//   return this.age == cust.age && this.name.equals(cust.name);
//  }
//  
//  return false;
// }
  
}

                                                                            # 7.2.1ã€é‡å†™equals()æ–¹æ³•çš„åŸåˆ™

                                                                            • å¯¹ç§°æ€§ï¼šå¦‚æœx.equals(y)è¿”å›æ˜¯â€œtrueâ€ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆy.equals(x)ä¹Ÿåº”è¯¥è¿”å›æ˜¯â€œtrueâ€ã€‚

                                                                            • ä¼ é€’æ€§ï¼šå¦‚æœx.equals(y)è¿”å›æ˜¯â€œtrueâ€ï¼Œè€Œä¸”y.equals(z)è¿”å›æ˜¯â€œtrueâ€ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆz.equals(x)ä¹Ÿåº”è¯¥è¿”å›æ˜¯â€œtrueâ€ã€‚

                                                                            ç»ƒä¹ ä¸€

                                                                            /*
 * .ç¼–å†™Orderç±»ï¼Œæœ‰intå‹çš„orderIdï¼ŒStringå‹çš„orderNameï¼Œ
 * ç›¸åº”çš„getter()å’Œsetter()æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä¸¤ä¸ªå‚æ•°çš„æ„é€ å™¨ï¼Œé‡å†™çˆ¶ç±»çš„equals()æ–¹æ³•ï¼špublic booleanequals(Object obj)ï¼Œ
 * å¹¶åˆ¤æ–­æµ‹è¯•ç±»ä¸­åˆ›å»ºçš„ä¸¤ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡æ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰ã€‚
 * 
 * 
 */
public class OrderTest {
 public static void main(String[] args) {
  Order order1 = new Order(1001,"AA");
  Order order2 = new Order(1001,"BB");
  
  System.out.println(order1.equals(order2)); //false
  
  Order order3 = new Order(1001,"BB");
  System.out.println(order2.equals(order3)); //true
 }
}

class Order{
 private int orderId;
 private String orderName;
 public int getOrderId() {
  return orderId;
 }
 public void setOrderId(int orderId) {
  this.orderId = orderId;
 }
 public String getOrderName() {
  return orderName;
 }
 public void setOrderName(String orderName) {
  this.orderName = orderName;
 }
 public Order(int orderId, String orderName) {
  super();
  this.orderId = orderId;
  this.orderName = orderName;
 }
 public boolean equals(Object obj){
  if(this == obj){   
   return true;
  }
  if(obj instanceof Order){
   Order order = (Order)obj;
   //æ­£ç¡®çš„
   return this.orderId == order.orderId && this.orderName.equals(order.orderName);
   //é”™è¯¯çš„
//   return this.orderId == order.orderId && this.orderName == order.orderName;
  }
  return false;
 }
}

                                                                            ç»ƒä¹ äºŒ

                                                                            /*
 * è¯·æ ¹æ®ä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç è‡ªè¡Œå®šä¹‰èƒ½æ»¡è¶³éœ€è¦çš„MyDateç±»,åœ¨MyDateç±»ä¸­è¦†ç›–equalsæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œ
 * ä½¿å…¶åˆ¤æ–­å½“ä¸¤ä¸ªMyDateç±»å‹å¯¹è±¡çš„å¹´æœˆæ—¥éƒ½ç›¸åŒæ—¶ï¼Œç»“æœä¸ºtrueï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¸ºfalseã€‚
 * public boolean equals(Object o)
 */
public class MyDateTest {
 public static void main(String[] args) {
  MyDate m1= new MyDate(14, 3, 1976);
  MyDate m2= new MyDate(14, 3, 1976);
  if(m1== m2) {
   System.out.println("m1==m2");
  } else{
   System.out.println("m1!=m2"); // m1 != m2
  }
  
  if(m1.equals(m2)) {
   System.out.println("m1 is equal to m2");// m1 is equal to m2
  } else{
   System.out.println("m1 is not equal to m2");
  }
 }
}

class MyDate{
 private int day;
 private int month;
 private int year;
 
 public MyDate(int day, int month, int year) {
  super();
  this.day = day;
  this.month = month;
  this.year = year;
 }

 public int getDay() {
  return day;
 }

 public void setDay(int day) {
  this.day = day;
 }

 public int getMonth() {
  return month;
 }


 public void setMonth(int month) {
  this.month = month;
 }

 public int getYear() {
  return year;
 }

 public void setYear(int year) {
  this.year = year;
 }
 
 @Override
 public boolean equals(Object obj) {
  if(this == obj){
   return true;
  }
  if(obj instanceof MyDate){
   MyDate myDate = (MyDate)obj;
   return this.day == myDate.day && this.month == myDate.month &&
     this.year == myDate.year;
  }
  return false;
 }

// @Override
// public boolean equals(Object obj) {
//  if (this == obj)
//   return true;
//  if (obj == null)
//   return false;
//  if (getClass() != obj.getClass())
//   return false;
//  MyDate other = (MyDate) obj;
//  if (day != other.day)
//   return false;
//  if (month != other.month)
//   return false;
//  if (year != other.year)
//   return false;
//  return true;
// }
  
}

                                                                            # 7.3ã€toStringçš„ä½¿ç”¨

                                                                            public class Customer {
 
 private String name;
 private int age;
 public String getName() {
  return name;
 }
 public void setName(String name) {
  this.name = name;
 }
 public int getAge() {
  return age;
 }
 public void setAge(int age) {
  this.age = age;
 }
 public Customer() {
  super();
 }
 public Customer(String name, int age) {
  super();
  this.name = name;
  this.age = age;
 }

 //è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆçš„equals()
 @Override
 public boolean equals(Object obj) {
  if (this == obj)
   return true;
  if (obj == null)
   return false;
  if (getClass() != obj.getClass())
   return false;
  Customer other = (Customer) obj;
  if (age != other.age)
   return false;
  if (name == null) {
   if (other.name != null)
    return false;
  } else if (!name.equals(other.name))
   return false;
  return true;
 }
 
 //é‡å†™åŸåˆ™ï¼Œæ¯”è¾ƒä¸¤ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡çš„å®ä½“å†…å®¹(å³nameå’Œage)æ˜¯å¦ç›¸åŒ
 //æ‰‹åŠ¨å®ç°equals()çš„é‡å†™
// @Override
// public boolean equals(Object obj) {
//  
  System.out.println("Customer equals()....");
//  if(this == obj){
//   return true;
//  }
//  
//  if(obj instanceof Customer){
//   Customer cust = (Customer)obj;
//   //æ¯”è¾ƒä¸¤ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡çš„å±æ€§æ˜¯å¦éƒ½ç›¸åŒ
   if(this.age == cust.age && this.name.equals(cust.name)){
    return true;
   }else{
    return false;
   }
//   
//   //æˆ–
//   return this.age == cust.age && this.name.equals(cust.name);
//  }
//  
//  return false;
// }
 
 //æ‰‹åŠ¨å®ç°
// @Override
// public String toString() {
//  return "Customer[name = " + name + ",age = " + age + "]";
// }
 
 //è‡ªåŠ¨å®ç°
 @Override
 public String toString() {
  return "Customer [name=" + name + ", age=" + age + "]";
 }

}

                                                                            ToStringTestç±»

                                                                            import java.util.Date;
/*
 * Objectç±»ä¸­toString()çš„ä½¿ç”¨
 * 
 * 1.å½“æˆ‘ä»¬è¾“å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªå¼•ç”¨å¯¹è±¡æ—¶ï¼Œå®é™…ä¸Šå°±æ˜¯è°ƒç”¨å½“å‰å¯¹è±¡çš„toString()
 * 2.Objectç±»ä¸­toStringçš„å®šä¹‰æ–¹æ³•
 *  public String toString() {
 *      return getClass().getName() + "@" + Integer.toHexString(hashCode());
 *  }
 * 
 * 3.åƒStringã€Dateã€Fileã€åŒ…è£…ç±»ç­‰éƒ½é‡å†™äº†Objectç±»ä¸­çš„toString()æ–¹æ³•ã€‚
 *   ä½¿å¾—åœ¨è°ƒç”¨toString()æ—¶ï¼Œè¿”å›"å®ä½“å†…å®¹"ä¿¡æ¯.
 * 
 * 4.è‡ªå®šä¹‰ç±»å¦‚æœé‡å†™toString()æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå½“è°ƒç”¨æ­¤æ–¹æ³•æ—¶ï¼Œè¿”å›å¯¹è±¡çš„"å®ä½“å†…å®¹".
 */
public class ToStringTest {
 public static void main(String[] args) {
  
  Customer cust1 = new Customer("Tom" ,21);
  System.out.println(cust1.toString()); //github4.Customer@15db9742
  System.out.println(cust1);  //github4.Customer@15db9742 ---> Customer[name = Tom,age = 21]
  
  String str = new String("MM");
  System.out.println(str);
  
  Date date = new Date(45362348664663L);
  System.out.println(date.toString()); //Wed Jun 24 12:24:24 CST 3407
  
 }
}

                                                                            GeometricObjectç±»

                                                                            public class GeometricObject {
 protected  String  color;
 protected  double  weight;
 
 public GeometricObject() {
  super();
  this.color = "white";
  this.weight = 1.0;
 }
 
 public GeometricObject(String color, double weight) {
  super();
  this.color = color;
  this.weight = weight;
 }

 public String getColor() {
  return color;
 }

 public void setColor(String color) {
  this.color = color;
 }

 public double getWeight() {
  return weight;
 }

 public void setWeight(double weight) {
  this.weight = weight;
 }
}

                                                                            Circleç±»

                                                                            public class Circle extends GeometricObject{
 private double radius;

 public Circle() { //åˆå§‹åŒ–å¯¹è±¡çš„colorå±æ€§ä¸ºâ€œwhiteâ€ï¼Œweightå±æ€§ä¸º1.0ï¼Œradiuså±æ€§ä¸º1.0ã€‚
  super(); //superè‡ªå¸¦ï¼Œä¸éœ€å†å†™
//  this.color = "white";
//  this.weight = 1.0;
  this.radius = 1.0;
 }

 //åˆå§‹åŒ–å¯¹è±¡çš„colorå±æ€§ä¸ºâ€œwhiteâ€ï¼Œweightå±æ€§ä¸º1.0ï¼Œradiusæ ¹æ®å‚æ•°æ„é€ å™¨ç¡®å®šã€‚
 public Circle(double radius) { 
  super(); //superè‡ªå¸¦ï¼Œä¸éœ€å†å†™
//  this.color = "white";
//  this.weight = 1.0;
  this.radius = radius;
 }

 public Circle(double radius,String color,double weight) {
  super(color,weight);
  this.radius = radius;
 }
 
 public double getRadius() {
  return radius;
 }

 public void setRadius(double radius) {
  this.radius = radius;
 }

 //è®¡ç®—åœ†çš„é¢ç§¯
 public double findArea(){
  return Math.PI * radius * radius;
 }
 
 @Override //é‡å†™equalsæ–¹æ³•,æ¯”è¾ƒä¸¤ä¸ªåœ†çš„åŠå¾„æ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰ï¼Œå¦‚ç›¸ç­‰ï¼Œè¿”å›trueã€‚
 public boolean equals(Object obj) {
  if(this == obj){
   return true;
  }
  
  if(obj instanceof Circle){
   Circle c = (Circle)obj;
   return this.radius == c.radius;
  }
  
  return false;
 }

 @Override
 public String toString() { //é‡å†™toStringæ–¹æ³•,è¾“å‡ºåœ†çš„åŠå¾„ã€‚
  return "Circle [radius=" + radius + "]";
 }
 
}

                                                                            æµ‹è¯•ç±»

                                                                            /*
 * å†™ä¸€ä¸ªæµ‹è¯•ç±»ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºä¸¤ä¸ªCircleå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­å…¶é¢œè‰²æ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰ï¼›
 * åˆ©ç”¨equalsæ–¹æ³•åˆ¤æ–­å…¶åŠå¾„æ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰ï¼›åˆ©ç”¨toString()æ–¹æ³•è¾“å‡ºå…¶åŠå¾„ã€‚

public class CircleTest {

  Circle circle1 = new Circle(2.3);
  Circle circle2 = new Circle(3.3,"white",2.0);
  
  System.out.println("é¢œè‰²æ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰: " + circle1.getColor().equals(circle2.color));
  
  System.out.println("åŠå¾„æ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰: " + circle1.equals(circle2));
  
  System.out.println(circle1);
  System.out.println(circle2.toString());
 }
}

                                                                            # 8.2ã€åŒ…è£…ç±»çš„ä½¿ç”¨

 * åŒ…è£…ç±»çš„ä½¿ç”¨
 * 1.javaæä¾›äº†8ç§åŸºæœ¬æ•°æ®ç±»å‹å¯¹åº”çš„åŒ…è£…ç±»ï¼Œä½¿å¾—åŸºæœ¬æ•°æ®ç±»å‹çš„å˜é‡å…·æœ‰ç±»çš„ç‰¹å¾

                                                                            # 8.3ã€åŒ…è£…ç±»ä¸åŸºæœ¬æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ç›¸äº’è½¬æ¢

                                                                            import org.junit.Test;
/*
 * 2.åŸºæœ¬æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ã€åŒ…è£…ç±»ã€Stringä¸‰è€…ä¹‹é—´çš„ç›¸äº’è½¬æ¢ã€‚

 */
public class WrapperTest {
 
 //Stringç±»å‹---> åŸºæœ¬æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ã€åŒ…è£…ç±»,è°ƒç”¨åŒ…è£…ç±»çš„parseXxx()
 @Test
 public void test5(){
  String str1 = "123";
//  String str1 = "123a";
  
  //é”™è¯¯çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œå¯èƒ½ä¼šæŠ¥é”™
//  int num1 = (int)str1;
//  Integer in1 = (Integer)str1;
  
  int num2 = Integer.parseInt(str1); 
  System.out.println(num2 + 1); //124
  
  String str2 = "true";
  Boolean b1 = Boolean.parseBoolean(str2);
  System.out.println(b1); //true
  
 }
 
 //åŸºæœ¬æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ã€åŒ…è£…ç±»---ã€‹Stringç±»å‹ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨Stringé‡è½½çš„valueOf(Xxx xxx)
 @Test
 public void test4(){
  int num1 = 10;
  //æ–¹å¼1:è¿æ¥è¿ç®—
  String str1 = num1 + "";
  //æ–¹å¼2:è°ƒç”¨Stringçš„valueOf(Xxx xxx)
  float f1 = 12.3f;
  String str2 = String.valueOf(f1); //"12.3"
  
  Double d1 = new Double(12.4);
  String str3 = String.valueOf(d1);
  System.out.println(str2);
  System.out.println(str3); //"12.4"
  
 }
 
 /*
  * JDK 5.0 æ–°ç‰¹æ€§:è‡ªåŠ¨è£…ç®±ä¸è‡ªåŠ¨æ‹†ç®±
  */
 @Test
 public void test3(){
//  int num1 = 10;
//  //åŸºæœ¬æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ --ã€‹ åŒ…è£…ç±»çš„å¯¹è±¡
//  method(num1); //Object obj = num1
  
  //è‡ªåŠ¨è£…ç®±:åŸºæœ¬æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ --ã€‹ åŒ…è£…ç±»
  int num2 = 10;
  Integer in1 = num2;//è‡ªåŠ¨è£…ç®±
  
  boolean b1 = true;
  Boolean b2 = b1;//è‡ªåŠ¨è£…ç®±
  
  //è‡ªåŠ¨æ‹†ç®±ï¼šåŒ…è£…ç±» --ã€‹ åŸºæœ¬æ•°æ®ç±»å‹
  System.out.println(in1.toString());
  
  int num3 = in1;
  
 }
 
 public void method(Object obj){
  System.out.println(obj);
 }
 
 //åŒ…è£…ç±» --ã€‹ åŸºæœ¬æ•°æ®ç±»å‹:è°ƒç”¨åŒ…è£…ç±»çš„xxxValue()
 @Test
 public void test2() {
  Integer in1 = new Integer(12);
  int i1 = in1.intValue();
  System.out.println(i1 + 1); 
  
  Float f1 = new Float(12.3f);
  float f2 = f1.floatValue();
  System.out.println(f2 + 1); 
 }
 
 //åŸºæœ¬æ•°æ®ç±»å‹--ã€‹åŒ…è£…ç±»,è°ƒç”¨åŒ…è£…ç±»çš„æ„é€ å™¨
 @Test
 public void test1() {
  int num1 = 10;
//  System.out.println(num1.toString());
  
  Integer in1 = new Integer(num1);
  System.out.println(in1.toString());
  
  Integer in2 = new Integer("123");
  System.out.println(in2.toString());
  
  //æŠ¥å¼‚å¸¸
//  Integer in3 = new Integer("123abc");
//  System.out.println(in3.toString());
  
  Float f1 = new Float(12.3f);
  Float f2 = new Float("12.3");
  System.out.println(f1);
  System.out.println(f2);
  
  Boolean b1 = new Boolean(true);
  Boolean b2 = new Boolean("true");
  
  Boolean b3 = new Boolean("true123");
  System.out.println(b3); //false
  
  Order order = new Order();
  System.out.println(order.isMale); //false
  System.out.println(order.isFemale); //null
  
 }
}

class Order{
 
 boolean isMale;
 Boolean isFemale;
}

                                                                            import org.junit.Test;
/*
 * å¦‚ä¸‹ä¸¤ä¸ªé¢˜ç›®è¾“å‡ºç»“æœç›¸åŒå—ï¼Ÿå„æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆï¼š
 *   Object o1= true? new Integer(1) : new Double(2.0);
 *   System.out.println(o1);//
 * 
 *   Object o2;
 *   if(true)
 *    o2 = new Integer(1);
 *  else 
 *   o2 = new Double(2.0);
 *  System.out.println(o2);//
 *
 */
public class InterViewTest {

 @Test
 public void test(){
  Object o1= true? new Integer(1) : new Double(2.0);
  System.out.println(o1);// 1.0
 }
 
 @Test
 public void test2(){
  Object o2;
  if(true)
   o2 = new Integer(1);
  else 
   o2 = new Double(2.0);
  System.out.println(o2);// 1
 }
 
 @Test
 public void method1() {
  Integer i = new Integer(1);
  Integer j = new Integer(1);
  System.out.println(i == j); //false
  
     //Integerå†…éƒ¨å®šä¹‰äº†ä¸€ä¸ªIntegerCacheç»“æ„ï¼ŒIntegerCacheä¸­å®šä¹‰Integer[]
  //ä¿å­˜äº†ä»-128-127èŒƒå›´çš„æ•´æ•°ã€‚å¦‚æœæˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨è‡ªåŠ¨è£…ç®±çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼Œç»™Integerèµ‹å€¼çš„èŒƒå›´åœ¨å…¶ä¸­æ—¶ï¼Œ
  //å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨æ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ ï¼Œä¸ç”¨å†å»newäº†ã€‚ç›®çš„ï¼Œæé«˜æ•ˆç‡ã€‚
  
  Integer m = 1;
  Integer n = 1;
  System.out.println(m == n);//true
  
  Integer x = 128;//ç›¸å½“äºnewäº†ä¸€ä¸ªIntegerå¯¹è±¡
  Integer y = 128;//ç›¸å½“äºnewäº†ä¸€ä¸ªIntegerå¯¹è±¡
  System.out.println(x == y);//false

 }
}

                                                                            2ã€ç¼–ç¨‹é¢˜

                                                                            import java.util.Scanner;
import java.util.Vector;

/*
 * åˆ©ç”¨Vectorä»£æ›¿æ•°ç»„å¤„ç†ï¼šä»é”®ç›˜è¯»å…¥å­¦ç”Ÿæˆç»©ï¼ˆä»¥è´Ÿæ•°ä»£è¡¨è¾“å…¥ç»“æŸï¼‰ï¼Œ
 * æ‰¾å‡ºæœ€é«˜åˆ†ï¼Œå¹¶è¾“å‡ºå­¦ç”Ÿæˆç»©ç­‰çº§ã€‚ïƒ˜
 * 
 * æç¤ºï¼šæ•°ç»„ä¸€æ—¦åˆ›å»ºï¼Œé•¿åº¦å°±å›ºå®šä¸å˜ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åœ¨åˆ›å»ºæ•°ç»„å‰å°±éœ€è¦çŸ¥é“å®ƒçš„é•¿åº¦ã€‚
 * è€Œå‘é‡ç±»java.util.Vectorå¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®éœ€è¦åŠ¨æ€ä¼¸ç¼©ã€‚ïƒ˜
 * 
 * åˆ›å»ºVectorå¯¹è±¡ï¼šVector v=new Vector();ïƒ˜
 * ç»™å‘é‡æ·»åŠ å…ƒç´ ï¼šv.addElement(Object obj);   //objå¿…é¡»æ˜¯å¯¹è±¡ïƒ˜
 * å–å‡ºå‘é‡ä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ ï¼šObject  obj=v.elementAt(0);ïƒ¼
 * æ³¨æ„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ çš„ä¸‹æ ‡æ˜¯0ï¼Œè¿”å›å€¼æ˜¯Objectç±»å‹çš„ã€‚ïƒ˜
 * è®¡ç®—å‘é‡çš„é•¿åº¦ï¼šv.size();ïƒ˜
 * è‹¥ä¸æœ€é«˜åˆ†ç›¸å·®
 *   10åˆ†å†…ï¼šAç­‰ï¼›
 *   20åˆ†å†…ï¼šBç­‰ï¼›
 *   30åˆ†å†…ï¼šCç­‰ï¼›
 *   å…¶å®ƒï¼šDç­‰
 * 
 */
public class VectorTest {
 public static void main(String[] args) {
  // 1.å®ä¾‹åŒ–Scannerï¼Œç”¨äºä»é”®ç›˜è·å–å­¦ç”Ÿæˆç»©
  Scanner scan = new Scanner(System.in);

  // 2.åˆ›å»ºVectorå¯¹è±¡ï¼šVector v=new Vector();ç›¸å½“äºåŸæ¥çš„æ•°ç»„
  Vector v = new Vector();

  // 3.é€šè¿‡for(;;)æˆ–while(true)æ–¹å¼ï¼Œç»™Vectorä¸­æ·»åŠ æ•°ç»„
  int maxScore = 0;
  for (;;) {
   System.out.println("è¯·è¾“å…¥å­¦ç”Ÿæˆç»©ï¼ˆä»¥è´Ÿæ•°ä»£è¡¨è¾“å…¥ç»“æŸï¼‰");
   int score = scan.nextInt();
   // 3.2 å½“è¾“å…¥æ˜¯è´Ÿæ•°æ—¶ï¼Œè·³å‡ºå¾ªç¯
   if (score < 0) {
    break;
   }
   if (score > 100) {
    System.out.println("è¾“å…¥çš„æ•°æ®éæ³•ï¼Œè¯·é‡æ–°è¾“å…¥");
    continue;
   }
   // 3.1 æ·»åŠ æ“ä½œï¼šï¼šv.addElement(Object obj)
   // jdk5.0ä¹‹å‰ï¼š
   // Integer inScore = new Integer(score);
   // v.addElement(inScore);//å¤šæ€
   // jdk5.0ä¹‹åï¼š
   v.addElement(score);// è‡ªåŠ¨è£…ç®±
   // 4.è·å–å­¦ç”Ÿæˆç»©çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼
   if (maxScore < score) {
    maxScore = score;
   }
  }

  // 5.éå†Vectorï¼Œå¾—åˆ°æ¯ä¸ªå­¦ç”Ÿçš„æˆç»©ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸æœ€å¤§æˆç»©æ¯”è¾ƒï¼Œå¾—åˆ°æ¯ä¸ªå­¦ç”Ÿçš„ç­‰çº§ã€‚
  char level;
  for (int i = 0; i < v.size(); i++) {
   Object obj = v.elementAt(i);
   // jdk 5.0ä¹‹å‰ï¼š
   // Integer inScore = (Integer)obj;
   // int score = inScore.intValue();
   // jdk 5.0ä¹‹åï¼š
   int score = (int) obj;

   if (maxScore - score <= 10) {
    level = 'A';
   } else if (maxScore - score <= 20) {
    level = 'B';
   } else if (maxScore - score <= 30) {
    level = 'C';
   } else {
    level = 'D';
   }

   System.out.println("student-" + i + " score is " + score + ",level is " + level);

  }
 }
}
